text.破天荒なちびっこ学園理事長・秋川の宣言で\\n設立された新レース<color=#:
With an outrageous declaration, young academy 
chairwoman Akikawa establishes a new race — <color=#FF6D26>URA 
Finals</color>! Trainers and horsegirls work hand in hand 
to become its maiden champion!
text.チームで団結！ 新たな青春！ ……と、\\n急遽始まったチーム対抗戦<color:
Team up! A new experience awaits! …So began the 
sudden new team battle — <color=#FF6D26>Aoharu Hai</color>. But before 
the fun can start the academy faces a crisis!? 
Stand united and claim victory to save the 
freedoms of Tracen Academy!
text.ウマ娘たちはなぜライブをするのか？\\n突如現れたプロデューサーが提言した\\n:
Why do horsegirls sing at lives? A producer 
suddenly appears to propose a new plan; 
the <color=#FF6D26>Grand Live</color>. Horsegirls face their lives from 
a different perspective, and the answers 
they reach are—!
text.メディア主導で設立された新レース\\n<color=#FF6D26>『トゥインク: A new race established by the media, <color=#FF6D26>"Twinkle Star \nClimax"</color>. A battle to determine the strongest! Run \ntowards your own climax, chasing your dreams!
text.ウマ娘を全力で支えたいトレーナーたち\\nの前に現れたのは、三女神の名を冠する\:
A support AI carrying the names of the 
3 goddesses is the newest development 
to confront trainers in their quest to support 
their horsegirls with all they have. Through 
the wisdom imparted this way, they now aim 
to reach new heights in the Grand Masters.
text.世界最高峰のレース『凱旋門賞』。\\nその勝利を求め、挑み続ける者たちが\\nい:
Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe, the peak of international racing. 
Those who seek their victory at the top of the world every year. 
<color=#FF6D26>Project L'Arc</color>, newly established at Tracen Academy. 
The curtain rises on a wistful journey of chasing dreams.
